Articles.Content:
Mods used

The bomb out of this pack:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=416.msg3139#msg3139

The modular missiles from here:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4886.0

The 1.5 connectors, bicoupler and radial decoupler from Silisko Edition 2:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=6397.0

What is it?

The Tiger Multi-Use Combat Aircraft was designed to be fast, maneuverable and with a wide range of uses. It can either be fitted with a loadout of six dumb bombs, or twelve Air-To-Surface missiles.

Pictures

We have assembled all the images in one handy album, right here:

http://imgur.com/a/q7ale

WHERE CAN I GET THIS GENIUS CONTRAPTION?!

RIGHT IN THE ATTACHMENTS, AS SOON AS YOU STOP SHOUTING, MY GOOD SIR!
